lines:
19565C Lk 
Carton-Hankow Railway - 
Hrien Ning City Hipei, China

Oct.284 1915

my dan M. Sham

el

ilang Impai jam o ou

Please excuse may seeming 
nybet in not writing to you for so lo 
á time. The fact I was working on one 
railway from which I did not have a 
moment to myself. Though, I have not 
written you head from you for a long 
time but hake you are in the best of health

As I got back to Hien ring at 
for a few days recto take this opportunity 
to enclose a draft here for $200 (Two 
hunched dollar) to refused of what famegme 
when I was in America Kindly acknowledge 
recept for same. I would have set you 
long before had the Exchange sa title come 
I wish to have your kindness rend me may 
account y see how much more I still ame 
you so that I can arrange to close it 
somes. I trust that the delay mill in 
no mine inconvenie you,
raw: 19565C Lk Carton-Hankow Railway Hrien Ning City Hipei, China Oct.284 1915 my dan M. Sham el ilang Impai jam o ou Please excuse may seeming nybet in not writing to you for so lo á time. The fact I was working on one railway from which I did not have a moment to myself. Though, I have not written you head from you for a long time but hake you are in the best of health As I got back to Hien ring at for a few days recto take this opportunity to enclose a draft here for $200 (Two hunched dollar) to refused of what famegme when I was in America Kindly acknowledge recept for same. I would have set you long before had the Exchange sa title come I wish to have your kindness rend me may account y see how much more I still ame you so that I can arrange to close it somes. I trust that the delay mill in no mine inconvenie you,

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter apologizing for the delay in writing. He encloses a check for $200 to cover expenses incurred and asks for the balance due. Luk cannot send political news because that is prohibited by the government and says that Stearns will see changes in China.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
